Tucson Prime was proud of Rat Trap's accomplishments the first time, so to =
that he grins for a short moment with a quick chuckle. Yet, he gives his ha=
nds to Perceptor to cooperate with him.  Night Shift on the other hand also=
 gives his hands up for cuffing but gives  Perceptor a dirty look.

" I so =
hope you sanitized your mitts before touchn' me.  Never know where they've =
been, especially when ya can't see worth a slag in front of your face."

Tu=
cson snaps his neck at Night Shift.

"Night Shift, no.  Refrain from making=
 comments. It will only make matters worse."

Night Shift nodds.

"Sorry bo=
ss, couldn't resist."

Tucson sends a message to Rat Trap and Quick Stride =
via com link.

"Rat Trap, if you two are still in the area, I suggest you r=
etreat immediately, I repeat, retreat immediately."

The message is reached=
 as Rat Trap remounts on Quickstride's back.

"No worries Rat Trap, I know =
a short cut back ta the Ark!"

The effects of the bean pods, ferments in hi=
s stomach, as Rat Trap pinches his nose.

" Talk about hazardous fumes!  PU=
!  Quickstride!"

The horse bends his ears back as he makes a dash for it.
=

" Sorry.  Hey, I pitty the predacon who tries to tail me." 

On fast hoove=
s, Quickstride takes the shortcut and attempts to pull away from the fortre=
ss parameter.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, <airly2002@...> wrote:
>
> Hy=
dras/Perceptor/kup:
> 
> "I want them OUT my territory, Prime"said Hydras c=
ooly "The last time the rodent was in my base, you two have done a lot trou=
bles, I just want to be sure that they dont do nothing this time... So, you=
 should better comand them to leave my terriory without futher delay... Per=
ceptor, Scourge, cyclonus and Rodimus, Let's scort our Prisioners to their =
rooms... And you little one"said thee Predacon boss to Nightlight"Wait here=
"
> 
> Perceptor started to hand cuff Kup's hand in his back and he attempe=
d to do the same with Tucson and Nightshift
> 
> From: Sandy 
> Sent: Wedne=
sday, April 14, 2010 10:57 PM
> To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
> Subject: Re: =
BlackFortress
> 
> 
>   
> Tucson was good at blocking out negative comment=
s. As Rodimus taunts him, he simply ignores him, not uttering one word abou=
t it for a moment or so, and he also had Hydras breathing down his neck con=
figuratively. Still he keeps calm throughout, and first directs his attenti=
on to Rodimus.
> 
> "Failure? Hmm, Rodimus I don't know. To you it may seem=
 like failure, to me, yes, it was a mistake but also a learning experience.=
 Learn not to go too fast, yet make decisions carefully. So, yes, I configu=
ratively got a flat tire along the way. But tires can be changed and after =
that, it's back on the road like nothing happened. Of course to you, it's l=
ike a perpetual road block. There, you have my answer. Nothing more."
> 
> =
He quietly follows orders by discarding his weaponry. Having left his cross=
 bow behind, he merely gives up an old sword and spear, as his weapons. He =
somehow felt that if he came with the bare minimal he wouldn't lose much.
>=
 
> Night Shift also discards his riffle without revolt. Yet he looks at Sc=
orponok after hearing what Tucson Prime said and how he was viewing the sit=
uation.
> 
> " Okay, yeah, things went South. Big deal, happens all the tim=
e."
> 
> Tucson then looks to Cyclonus, yes, he had looked as he had before=
 he had lost his sight. It didn't surprise him though. He had see and been =
through worse.
> 
> " I'm sorry Cyclonus, there are no secrets to share wit=
h you. I have not the answers for the power that has been given to me, beca=
use I myself don't know them."
> 
> He lastly turns to Hydras. 
> 
> " Rat =
Trap and Quickstride pose no threat to you Hydras. They have not entered yo=
ur base, and done nothing to get you angry. So to that question, I have to =
say... LEAVE THEM OUT OF THIS. I am the one who made the mistake, and it's =
me you want, not them. So, I'm here aren't I? You have me and now you have =
nothing to fear from the outside world, because your main threat is now in =
your possession. Think about it, what can they do? They're no threat to you=
 at all."
> 
> Night Shift nodds in agreement to his commander's statement.=
 Tucson looks to all his comrades before having to be separated from them.
=
> 
> "Kup, I did not intend to put your spark in danger, and for that I am =
deeply sorry. Stay strong my friend, this isn't forever. And whatever happe=
ns, happens. My heart goes out to Elita and one day, hopefully, she will ne=
ver have to worry about anything ever again."
> 
> He puts a hand on Night =
Shift's shoulder.
> 
> " Night Shift, we're going to be separated from each=
 other. Again, this wouldn't be happening if I hadn't ran that red light. I=
 promise you I will make it up to you but not sure as of how I will do it j=
ust yet."
> 
> Night Shift nodds.
> 
> "Heey, it's cool, it's cool, we all =
mess up sometimes, like ya said. No worries boss bot, we'll get through thi=
s, like we always do. I'll be okay, I promise." 
> 
> They shake hands as t=
hey wait to be separated from each other.
> 
> Outside the fortress, Rat Tr=
ap senses something is a miss when it takes far too long for anyone to come=
 out. Quickstride looks down to him.
> 
> " Quickstride, it's been a really=
 long time and no word from Wheels or the others. Somethn's wrong."
> 
> Qu=
ickstride nodds.
> 
> "Yeah, something really stinks around here doesn't it=
, and it's not me this time, because I haven't had any bean pods lately."
>=
 
> Rat Trap swallows hard.
> 
> " He told us ta wait out here. But he also=
 told us that if he didn't come out right away, ta call for backup. Lord El=
der, it's me, Rat Trap. Wheels hasn't come out with the other guys yet, and=
 it's been a very long time. Something's wrong. I think we need backup sir.=
"
> 
> His voice falters a bit, as he wipes off a tear with his rodent paw.=

> 
> "Aww Wheels, why'dya have ta go'n do that for? You're the only real f=
riend I'll ever have."
> 
> Quickstride could see what was happening. He pu=
ts his nose down to his rodent comrade.
> 
> " Hey, he'll be okay, he proba=
bly ran inta a snag. He'll be fine, he's pretty buff now Rat Trap. Don't wo=
rry, I bet he's got somethn' up his manifold. It's just gonna take a while,=
 that's all."
> 
> Rat Trap composes himself and scrambles up onto Quickstr=
ide's back.
> 
> "We better find someplace ta hide."
> 
> Quickstride looks=
 around and finds a bit of thick greenery near the black fortress. He trots=
 toward it, vanishing into the vegitation.
> 
> "This should be okay for no=
w. Well, until Hydras sends his goons out ta find us which is probably what=
'll happen.... Ooohh, bean pods..."
> 
> Again he thinks of nothing but foo=
d and begins to munch on the bean pods. Rat Trap looks onto the fortress ho=
ping that Tucson Prime had a plan in place to get everyone out of there in =
one piece.
